CustomField.description: Used in ICON ios to define if a user is a manger (show My Store Top, show My team features..)
CustomField.formula: Profile.Name = 'ICON_SA Manager' || Profile.Name = 'ICON_Corporate' || Profile.Name = 'ICONiCS_SA_Manager' || Profile.Name = 'ICON_LV Administrator' || Profile.Name = 'ICON_STAR_Corporate' || Profile.Name = 'ICON_SAManager_EVERYWHERE' || ProfileId = '00ei0000000Uq8U'
CustomField.label: TECH Is Manager
